11122.content:
Jean gray felt herself slowly drift back into consciousness as she woke up. Her head felt somewhere between a headache and just very light headed, but thankfully that was fading fast as she stretched and rubbed her eyes and her temples. And as the odd feeling passed she felt something in her mouth and something really odd and almost damp around her waist, her bedding also felt softer than she remembered

She took the thing out of her mouth as her eyes finally and she rubbed her eyes again in disbelief before she looked again and confirmed that it was a pink pacifier that was way too big for a normal baby. In fact the drool covered thing was clearly designed for the mouth of a grown woman like her, she even felt a mild need to put the giant soother back in her mouth.

The shocked mutant girl looked past the binky and saw she was wearing some kind of pink shirt with the design of a chick popping out of an egg on the chest with her lower half covered by what looked like a hello kitty blanket. With two cautious fingers she picked up the blanket and moved it aside to reveal that the “shirt” she wore came together between her legs. It wasn’t the first time she’d worn an outfit like this but the snap buttons holding it together over an odd bulge as well as the general look and texture of it gave off a much more babyish feel.

Her suspicions were all but confirmed as she picked up on the faint odor of ammonia partially masked by talcum powder but she stills couldn’t stop herself from placing a single finger into one of the onsies leg holes and pulled the material to the side for another reveal. A reveal of not only a diaper, not only a baby diaper that fit her all too unnaturally well like it was made for her, but a visibly wet babyishly designed diaper. Almost believing it wasn’t real she poked the yellowed padding, eliciting a squish and a shiver.

Jean looked around in total confusion and almost fear, the pacifier somehow back in her mouth in some instinctual attempt to calm herself. And as the further realization that she was in a giant crib dawned on her Jean Grey...

choices: Trying to change her sopping wet diaper
111222.content:
Tossing the blankie aside Jean supported herself on the crib bars and stood to her feet with some difficulty as the semi swollen diaper separated her thighs. From a standing position the railing of the crib bars came to about her upper chest. And beyond the bars was what looked like her room but instead of being furnished for a grown woman like her it was made up for a big baby...well... also like her.

The walls were painted pastel colors, with a mural of her name written in big baby blocks with a giant changing table under it. There were shelves filled with what looked like toys in the corner opposite the crib and a pink dresser next to the crib. There was also a rocking horse a dollhouse and a circular rug tying the whole room together.

Jean swung her leg over the bars but struggled to pull her body up to the railing but eventually managed to get herself up there with a little telekinetic nudge. The mutant hero stopped to rest as her body straddled the threshold and she thought “what’s happening? This shouldn’t be this difficult”

But she only let herself stop for a moment before swinging herself over the other side. She landed on her feet but the danger room never taught her how to perform gymnastics in a used diaper so she fumbled back a few steps and landed on her butt on the middle of the carpet with a squish, a perfect bullseye.

The pacifier she’d forgotten about fell out again from the force of the fall as her lips that just held it twisted into a cringe at the icky feeling “ew, yucky!” She exclaimed instinctually. Then she got to work
111222.title: Climbed out of the crib to look for answers

1112222.content:
After a moment of squirming in her wet diaper Jean managed to compose herself and lifted her pink ruffled bottom off the colorful shape rug. And from her hands and knees she carefully stood up on her own two feet.

She cupped the diaper in her hand and gave it a few slaps as she considered trying to change out of it if not just remove it. But she ultimately decided against it, she needed to prioritize finding out what was going on or even get out of here, even though this did look a lot like her room at the X-mansion just designed differently. “Besides” she thought “this diaper isn’t even full yet. It can take a few more wettings”. And how did she know that!?

Deciding not to get caught up in that rabbit hole Jean made her way to the door. Thankfully it was unlocked and opened to reveal another familiar but different sight. It looked like the hall of the girls dormitory, but with a cutsie pink paint job to make sure you knew it was for girls, as well as some images of bunnies, duckies, flowers and other cute things a baby girl might like.

The sickeningly sweet artwork was periodically broken up by bedroom doors, each with a name written on it in colorful bubble letters.

111321.title: More options to diaper Kitty

1113211.content:
It was a cold Friday morning at the X-men mansion, a light snow on the grounds from previous snow storms. Unfortunately for one X-man, the morning was not going so well. Kitty Pryde had woken up to a wet feeling on her crotch that took a few seconds for her brain to register. She moaned as she quickly threw off all her covers and stripped herself and her bed to make a quick trip to the laundry room before she needed to leave for class. Quickly putting on a pair of panties and another pair of sweatpants she hurriedly phased down to the washer and threw her clothes in before running off to take a shower before her midterm. Most of the X-men were either out on missions, on vacations, or just away for personal reasons, leaving Jean Grey in charge of the facility at present. Kitty sighed as she tried mentally preparing herself for the day, cursing at herself for wetting the bed like some stupid kid. She was berating herself so furiously she began sobbing slightly, amplifying her telepathic signals, unintentionally drawing the attention of Jean.
         Jean was sipping coffee down in the kitchen of the mansion, waiting for Kitty to drive her to school. Though she was old enough to do so on her own, the Professor had expected more senior members such as Jean to take the other members out when needed. It also gave the X-men more of a family bond, helpful when put in life or death scenarios at times, and Jean somewhat enjoyed the role. Despite not actively reading minds, Jean picks up mood changes when they're drastic enough to those close to her, normally she subconsciously ignores such signals in large gatherings of people for fear of sensory overload but is usually safe to do so at the mansion. Worried about Kitty and wanting to make sure she was up, Jean set down her mug and headed upstairs to Kitty's room.
         Kitty was still in the shower when Jean arrived outside her door, only to find it still open. Jean stepped inside when she noticed the mattress was exposed, and upon smelling a faint odor, she felt the mattress as well. She gasped when she felt the damp spot in the center and quickly left her room. "Hey Kitty," she knocked on the bathroom door, "everything okay in there?"
         'Oh crap' Kitty thought to herself, "Yes Jean, I'm just finishing up!" she called as she turned off the water and started toweling herself off. "I'll be down in a minute." she said from the other side of the door.
         "Okay, I'll be downstairs then." Jean responded, heading back down the stairs. Kitty quickly dried herself off then grabbed some underwear, jeans, and a grey long sleeve shirt before running down to meet Jean. "All ready to go?" Jean asked, grabbing the keys looking Kitty over with a slight look of concern.
         Kitty nodded, "Yeah, I just want to get this over with." she sighed, her mind going back to her wet bed this morning.
         Jean grabbed both their coats as they hopped in the car, "Anything you want to talk about?" she asked, starting the car.
         Kitty blushed and looked away, "No, nothing's wrong." she stammered quickly.
         Jean sighed, "You know it's okay to tell me right?" she asked, a little worried about her.
         Kitty looked out the window still, "Yeah..." she trailed off.
         Jean grabbed her hand gently, "You know I can tell when something's wrong right?"
         Kitty turned back around, "The professor said you shouldn't read our minds!" she stammered almost hysterically.
         The car stopped at a light, "I know, and I didn't read your mind." Jean assured the young girl, "However, your bedroom door was open and I noticed your mattress was damp and the bed was stripped." Jean alluded as the light changed.
         Kitty blushed and looked away again, "It was just an accident, I umm... I..." she tried thinking of a comeback, but all she could do was think of the shame and began to tear up.
         Jean reached over again, "Hey, hey," she said, "it'll be okay honey. Maybe you want to talk about it?"
         Kitty shook her head no, "I don't know," she sighed, sniffling.
         "Well I may have something for you when you're done with school today," Jean offered the girl, "if you're interested?"
         "What might that be?" Kitty asked, turning back to Jean.
         "I was thinking about having you try some diapers so this doesn't happen again." Jean calmly explained.
         "Whoa whoa whoa," Kitty shook her head, "it was just a one time thing!" she blushed at the thought.
         "Okay," Jean said as they pulled up to the school, "good luck honey!" she called as Kitty left the car, "Call me whenever you're done."
         Kitty nodded as she headed inside to take her test, trying to control her emotions. She sighed as she entered the school building, 'diapers', she thought to herself. She blushed at the thought of wearing them, and tried to shake the thought out of her head and focus on her test. Kitty arrived in the room and took her seat in the middle of the room as the proctor handed out the exams and then began explaining the rules of the test.
         Three hours later Jean's phone started ringing, "Hello?" Jean answered.
         "Hi Jean, I'm done with my exam," Kitty answered, "can you come pick me up please?"
         "Sure thing! I'll head over now." Jean told her.
         "Thanks." Kitty said, hanging up and burrowing her head into her hands. She was sure she failed that test, all her studying the previous nights didn't seem to help at all. Her eyes started tearing up again as she wrapped herself in her jacket then sat on the steps outside waiting for Jean. Her mind drifted back to the diapers Jean had suggested as Kitty began worrying about her bed wetting again. All she could think of was her failures at this point and how bad she did on her test she didn't even notice Jean's car pull up until Jean taped on the horn. The slight start caused Kitty to jump a little bit, and she dashed to the car and quickly tossed her bag in the back before buckling in.
         "Hey!" Jean said, "How was your day?" she asked as Kitty began sobbing loudly. "Oh honey, it's okay." she assured the girl. "I'm sure you did better than you thought." Jean looked over and saw Kitty's pants start to grow a wet spot on the front, "Oh honey," she sighed, feeling bad for the girl.
         Kitty gasped as she tried to stop herself and broke down further when she didn't feel it stop. "I'm sorry Jean." she said between chocked sobs.
         Jean reached over and rubbed her arm, "We'll be okay, the car can be cleaned." Jean assured her. "I'm worried about you, will you talk to me?" Jean asked.
         "I just need some time." Kitty stammered, "I'm fine!" she insisted.
         Jean nodded, disagreeing with her on the inside, "Okay, well can I at least help you inside?" she asked as she pulled the car into the garage. Kitty quickly phased through the car and into the house as a response. Jean sighed, heading inside to grab some cleaning supplies for the car.
         Kitty had run inside to the bathroom where she shut herself in there thinking and crying while Jean cleaned the car seat. Jean came upstairs and knocked on the bathroom door, "Hey Kitty can I speak to you for a minute?"
         Kitty blushed, pulling her still wet panties back up but leaving her jeans on the floor, as she opened the bathroom door, "What?" she asked, sniffling.
         Jean first stepped forward and hugged her, "Can we talk?" she asked.
         Kitty pushed away, heading back to her room, "Later." she said, locking her door. Jean sighed once again, deciding to leave Kitty alone for the time being, as she entered her own room to read. After a few minutes Kitty knocked on her door, "Um Jean?"
         Jean hopped off her bed and let Kitty in, "Hey, everything okay?"
         Kitty shook her head no as she blushed, "Can we talk now?"
         Jean nodded, "Please come in," she offered, "lay down on my bed with me." She said, as Kitty entered the room, the large bed accommodating both of them as they sat down on both ends of it. "Where do you want to start?" Jean asked.
         Kitty sighed, pulling her legs in close, "Those diapers you mentioned," Kitty blushed, "were you serious about that?"
         Jean nodded, "Have you decided something?" she asked, hoping she wouldn't have to press the issue onto her.
         Kitty nodded, composing herself, "Can we um," she blushed again, "do that?" Jean nodded as she hopped off the bed and started searching through a bag she had brought up earlier. "It's not that I want to wear them it's just... I don't know," she sighed, frustrated with her inability to describe her feelings, "I guess I just don't want to piss myself again like some stupid baby!" she yelled.
         "Hey," Jean said sternly, "it's okay that you have accidents." She explained, "You are not,I repeat not, a stupid baby because of it." she said, bringing the package of diapers onto the bed. "You are under a tremendous amount of stress, and your body might not be able to handle it. I'm proud of you for wanting protection Kitty." Jean smiled, hugging her. "Now did you want me to change you?" she asked, offering the girl the chance.
         "Yes please," Kitty sniffed as they released their hug, "if you're really okay with doing it."
         "I wouldn't have offered otherwise." she assured her as she pulled one of the diapers out. The diaper was off-white with a yellow stripe running down the center and four tapes on the front. "Go ahead and take off your panties and lay down." Jean said, unfolding the diaper on the floor. Kitty nodded, blushing even more when she lowered her panties and laid down on top of the diaper. "It's okay honey," Jean assured her, lifting the front of the diaper and securing the tapes, "see? Not that bad right?" she smiled.
         "I guess so," Kitty blushed, checking out the diaper, "um Jean? Can I..." she stammered, "can we still talk please?" she pleaded
         "Of course." Jean said.
1113211.title: Kitty has accidents

11132111.content:
"Now what's on your mind?" Jean asked, sitting back down on the bed as Kitty sat down on the side opposite her.
         "I don't know," she sighed, "I just have been really stressed with school, I'm always a little afraid of people finding out but just always having to stay on top of what we are supposed to know and what we aren't is hard for me." She tried explaining, shifting her weight around on the diaper. The padding was still somewhat odd to her as she couldn't quite close her legs all the way, so she decided to cross her legs rather than curl them up.
         "I'm sorry there's no easy solution honey," Jean started, "we can go back to teaching you the best we can here if you'd like." Jean was referring to having to teach some of the mutants at the mansion as they hadn't controlled their powers yet, though most of them were younger students. "Though you're old enough in education years to where that might not be the best course of action." She admitted.
         Kitty shifted around again as she thought about that then agreed with Jean. "Yeah, I'm 18 now so I'll be trying to go into college soon." She said, rubbing her arms together as she began to stress about that now too.
         "Did you not want to go to college?" Jean asked, observing Kitty for any more stressful behavior.
         "I do I just, worry about the future." Kitty admitted, "like what if I'm away and something happens and no one will come after me, or what if I confess to someone about my powers and they hate me for it?"
         Jean crawled over next to Kitty and put one arm around her, "We will always come after you, and you're pretty capable yourself!" Jean hugged her tightly before letting go and facing her, "as for letting others know about your powers, that's something you won't have any control over. You're in control of your powers for the most part aren't you?" Jean asked. Kitty nodded, "Then people should only find out if you tell them, and if you really like them they will accept you for them."
         Kitty half-smiled at that, "You make it sound so easy."
         "It comes with experience," Jean said, "it's completely fine for you to stress out, that's part of living. I don't mean to make your concerns seem..."
         "Childish?" Kitty offered, looking away.
         "I was going to say 'less than they really are.'" Jean said.
         Kitty sighed, "I know, you're trying your best." Kitty turned back to her, "Can you keep this between us?"
         Jean smiled, "Everything you tell me stays between us, not even the Professor will hear about it."
         Kitty sighed again, "Okay, I just... feel kind of stupid for stressing about some of these things. I mean, most people are excited at the chance to go off to college. Yet here I am crying to you about it." Kitty looked away and kicked her legs out in frustration, the diaper crinkling loudly at this.
         "Talking to someone doesn't make you stupid or weak." Jean assured her, "It's actually better for you to talk to someone as long as they will listen and help, which I and probably most of the older X-men here will."
         Kitty brought her legs back and turned back to Jean, "Thank you Jean." She smiled.
         "I know you might have trouble believing me right now," Jean said, hugging the girl again, "but I promise, there's nothing wrong with talking."
         Kitty returned the hug, "If you say so." She sighed, "Jean why are you helping me?"
         They released their embrace, "What do you mean?" She asked, surprised by the question.
         "I mean you could have just let me handle everything," Kitty tried explaining, "but you wanted to help me, you even changed me into a diaper and cleaned up my accident. I'd have thought you might just..."
         "Just because you're 18 doesn't mean I won't help you," Jean said, adjusting her legs, "I'm still in charge, and I would treat you like a younger sibling." Jean smiled. Kitty blushed at this as Jean continued, "As for diapering you, I wanted to avoid anymore accidents and figured the best way to get you to agree was to help you out get changed. And whenever you're really distressed I feel like I need to step in and help." Jean paused and looked back at Kitty's face for her next question, "Would you rather I hadn't helped?"
         Kitty blushed, "I'm actually kind of glad you did, it's just embarrassing for you to have seen me like that."
         Jean smiled, "It's alright, I'm just glad you're doing a little better now. Was there anything else you wanted to get off your chest?" Jean asked.
         Kitty shook her head, "I think I'm done for now,"she sighed and hugged Jean again, "thank you." Jean smiled at this, "Can I stay in here with you?"
         "Sure honey, go grab a book or something to do then come on back in. I need to finish reading this chapter and then we can go do something fun downstairs okay?"
         Kitty nodded and waddled off to her room, still not adjusted to the padding between her legs yet. Jean smiled to herself as she watched Kitty's padded bum phase through her wall. A minute or so later Kitty knocked at Jean's door then came in, "Where did you find diapers this big?" she asked, waddling back onto Jean's bed with her book bag.
         "They're adult diapers Kitty, they sell them at the store. There are some online too with more babyish patterns too if you're interested." Jean said, remembering some cursory research while she was in college herself.
         Kitty blushed slightly, "I'm not planning on sticking with these," she poked at the diaper she was wearing, "other than a few days and nights."
         Jean giggled to herself, "Relax, I won't make you wear more babyish ones unless you wanted to. Those are day diapers by the way," she said pulling out another package of diapers, "these are what I'll change you into at night. Night diapers are thicker and more absorbent than those because they're supposed to last the night." She explained. "That said, I think you'll be fine in that one for a while."
         "Um what if I need to go to the bathroom?" Kitty asked.
         "Well I can take your diaper off and then you can go on the toilet or you can just go in the diaper if you want and I'll change you later. Why did you need to go?" Jean asked, getting up off the bed in preparation.
         "No, I just wanted to know." Kitty yawned, "Can I uh, take a nap in here Jean?" Kitty rubbed her eyes as she placed her book bag off the bed.
         Jean nodded, "You can do that, I'll wake you up in an hour or so okay?" Kitty nodded as she curled up on Jean's bed and shut her eyes. Jean smiled to herself as she went back to her reading. After a few minutes Kitty had fallen asleep as far as Jean could tell from her position. After another two pages Jean noticed Kitty scooting closer to her, her head resting right next to her chest. Jean smiled and slowly stroked Kitty's hair as she continued her reading. After Jean finished her chapter she looked over at the clock and saw Kitty still had fifteen minutes and decided that she would let her sleep when she noticed Kitty's diaper was beginning to discolor on the front. "Well good thing I put her in a diaper." Jean said quietly to herself, watching the stain on the front of the diaper grow and cause the diaper to grow as the padding and gel soaked up the urine. After a few seconds Kitty appeared to be finished and a relaxed smile formed on her face as Jean went back to reading.
         Soon enough it was time to wake Kitty up as Jean slid off the bed and grabbed another diaper, a towel, and some wipes. Setting them aside she stroked Kitty's hair again, "Time to wake up hun." She said as Kitty gently began stirring from her slumber.
         Kitty stretched her arms and yawned as she sat up on the bed, "Thanks Jean." She mumbled as she began to notice something was off. The diaper at her crotch was no longer just fluffy padding, it was warmer than usual and felt a little damp almost. Kitty looked down at the garment and her face turned a dark red as she hid her face from Jean.
         "Hey it's okay Kitty, that's what the diaper was for." Jean assured her, "I'm not mad honest." Jean said as she saw the girl's face turning red.
         "I thought talking to you was going to help this!" She stammered, "You said it was stress causing this!"
         "It still might be honey," Jean said, "this may take some time to figure out okay? And it might just be that you've picked up bed-wetting."
         Kitty let out a frustrated sigh and fell back onto the bed, "And I did it in front of you again!"
         Jean hopped back on the bed with her, "It's really okay Kitty, I'm proud of you for having picked a diaper earlier if that helps."
         Kitty just stared at the ceiling of Jean's room, "I'm sorry Jean, I'm just really embarrassed."
         Jean rubbed Kitty affectionately, "You don't need to be sorry honey."
         Kitty looked back at her, "And at least I didn't ruin your bed like the car seat." she sighed as she sat back up and hugged Jean.
         Jean smiled back at her, "Ready for a change?" Jean asked, hugging Kitty before looking back at the changing supplies.
         Kitty felt her diaper around for a few seconds, the texture of the sodden padding from the outside soft plastic backing as well as the warmth and moistness on the inside against her skin, "I uh..." she blushed again.
         Jean smiled, "You can wear that one for a while yet, I'll change you into your night-time one at 7 okay?" she said, reading the clock at 5:00. "Honest Kitty, I don't care if you enjoy it, I was worried there might be tears and a fight to put you into another one."
         Kitty poked her diaper a few times then left her hand on the center of the sodden padding, "Thanks Jean," she blushed, "and can you keep this between us too?"
         "Everything in here will remain with us." Jean assured her. "Well since we're the only ones here, what do you want to do?"
11132111.title: Talking

111321111.content:
Kitty folded her legs underneath herself as she thought of a few ideas, "Well Rouge is coming back tomorrow, so can I stay like this?" Kitty asked, referring to only wearing a shirt and the wet diaper around her waist.
         "That's fine, you don't need to wear a shirt if you don't want to either." Jean joked, "No pants at least lets me change you easier."
         Kitty smiled, "Maybe it's not so bad to have to wear these things." Kitty told her as she hopped off the bed. She stood up and stretched her arms together towards the sky, her legs still spread slightly apart. She could feel the warmth of the padding against her legs as she walked over to Jean's door. "Can we watch a movie?"
         Jean smiled and followed Kitty down the stairs, "How about some pizza too? To celebrate your break starting." Jean suggested. "I'll answer the door, don't worry."
         Kitty stuck her tongue out at her, "Yes please, I'll pick a movie out." Jean went to the computer and quickly ordered a large pizza and some bread-sticks for the pair. "Hey Jean?" Kitty asked as Jean sat on the couch, "is it weird that I changed my mind about the diapers?"
         "Well you never told me what you thought the clean ones felt like so I wouldn't know. If you're asking if it's weird to like wearing a dirty diaper, then I would say it's different, but not uncommon. I was doing research for a paper a few years ago and came across what's called the AB/DL scene, Adult Baby and Diaper Lover." Jean explained. "So maybe you're one of those." She suggested, "It might be a temporary thing too, but either way it's not a bad thing okay?" She assured Kitty.
         Kitty blushed, "Sorry I keep telling you so much Jean."
         "It's really okay Kitty," Jean said, "like I said, you're like a little sibling to me almost, and it's nice to be around you and talk. I never had younger siblings, so this is a new experience for me."
         Kitty blushed again as she put the movie in then moved over to the couch with Jean. Kitty had gotten used to the wet diaper at this point but she still wasn't sure about the situation and she half-hoped Jean would talk with her about it. As the movie started playing Jean looked over at Kitty to make sure everything was okay when she saw the strange look on her face, "Everything okay Kitty?"
         "I don't know." Kitty sighed as the opening credits started playing.
         Jean pulled Kitty over and laid her on her lap, "Come on Kitty, tell me what's wrong, please?"
         Kitty started tearing up as her emotions started spilling out again, "I just feel wrong for liking this now!" She exclaimed in frustration, "I was freaking out this morning because I wet my bed, then I had an accident in the car, but suddenly when I do it in a diaper on your bed it's okay?" She said, staring up at Jean.
         "Is it the accidents or the diapers?" Jean asked.
         "Both at this point," Kitty sighed, "I don't know." she sniffled.
         Jean thought for a moment before speaking, "Well the accidents are bad, and if things keep getting worse we'll do more, but for now let's try and get you to de-stress okay?" Jean said, stroking the girl's hair. "I won't make you wear diapers while you're awake, but I will diaper you while you're asleep okay?" Jean asked, "Do you want me to change you out of that one now or after the movie?"
         Kitty's sniffling had started to calm down a bit, "After the movie." She said.
         "Okay, we'll do that then." Jean said, "Everything's okay Kitty, no one else is here and I'm perfectly okay with you being in a diaper and using it." Jean promised. "Just take a few deep breaths, we'll enjoy the movie and eat some pizza when it arrives. If you need to go to the bathroom you can just go in your diaper okay? I believe you can make it to the bathroom, but for right now you're staying on my lap until we eat."
         Kitty nodded as Jean curled her closer, pressing the still warm padding against her crotch, she sighed, "What's wrong with me Jean?"
         Jean looked back down at her, "You're choosing to de-stress by wearing and using a diaper, that's better than choosing to do drugs just to relax. The way I see it there is nothing wrong with you. Does liking diapers freak you out that much?"
         "I don't want anyone else to find out, they'll think I'm..."
         Jean smiled, "What? A baby? Gross?" Kitty nodded, "Well sometimes adults need diapers, so that argument doesn't hold. Second, no one is going to find out about this, and if they do I'll make sure they never tell anyone okay?" Jean promised. Kitty gulped, she knew the older X-men could be very persuasive if someone got out of line. "We're all a family here anyways Kitty, no one will mistreat you even if they did find out."
         Kitty sighed at this comment, "Okay, thanks Jean. But, why are you so okay with the diapers?"
         "I already told you Kitty, I enjoy pretending to be your older sibling. It's actually nice to be taking care of someone." she blushed. Kitty blushed too as the doorbell rang, "I'll be right back." Jean said as she hopped up to answer the door and quickly brought the food back to the kitchen where she grabbed two plates. Putting two slices of pizza and two bread sticks on each plate for each of them, she carried the plates back into the main room and handed one to Kitty, "Eat up." she encouraged as the two began eating and finally started to enjoy the movie. Jean could see and feel Kitty more at ease, but knew she had several questions and worries that would come up after the movie.
         Kitty felt vulnerable as she swallowed a mouthful of pizza, like this was something she couldn't just phase through and be fine. She felt as though she was being a burden to Jean and though this movie was one of her favorites, she was having trouble enjoying it. After Jean finished her plate she set it down on one of the end tables then motioned for Kitty to sit on her lap. Kitty swallowed, "Why?"
         "Because I want you close to me, you can stay over there if you want though." Jean said, guessing that Kitty enjoyed being closer to her based on how she acting during the nap. Kitty blushed slightly and slowly got up, her diaper crinkling after having sunk into the couch slightly, then she plopped down onto her lap. Kitty was light for her age, a side effect of her powers some said, so Jean wasn't encumbered much by the ordeal. After a few minutes Kitty finished her food as well then put her plate on top of Jean's then laid back down with her head on Jean's lap. They remained in this position for the rest of the movie.

         When the credits finally started rolling again, Kitty turned her head to stare back at Jean. "Thank you for letting me on your lap."
         Jean smiled back down at her, "Anytime kiddo, you ready for that diaper change?" she asked. Kitty nodded and the two headed back up to Jean's room, Kitty following Jean as she examined her now cool diaper. The padding was still damp and squishy, but not nearly as warm anymore. As Jean helped Kitty onto the floor she asked, "do you need to go to the bathroom?"
         Kitty thought for a moment as she did a quick check on herself, "Not really, do you want me to try anyway?"
         Jean shook her head, "Nope, your night-time diaper holds more anyway. You can give it a test run tonight if you want." she winked, causing Kitty to blush slightly. Jean slowly untapped the front of the diaper, causing a cool breeze to run across Kitty's exposed crotch. Jean grabbed a wipe and smoothly began wiping down Kitty, not rubbing hard because there was not much to clean off. Kitty shivered slightly as Jean did so, "Sorry, almost done." she assured her charge as she pulled the dirty diaper away and put the thicker night diaper underneath her and taped it shut. "There we go," Jean said patting the front of the diaper, "how's it feel?"
         "A lot thicker." Kitty said looking the diaper over. The diaper was the same off-white but it had an M4 on the front instead of M2 and it was twice as thick, making it difficult for her to walk back with Jean.
         Jean giggled, "Well it's supposed to be, that's the diaper you're wearing to bed tonight." She noted Kitty waddling even more now as the girls headed back down the stairs, "So how about we talk again for a bit then I'll let you pick what we do after that."
         Kitty smiled as she toddled after Jean and sat back on her lap on the couch. "What's up Jean?"
         "You doing better now?" Jean asked, worried that she wasn't helping Kitty at all but was making things worse instead.
         Kitty nodded, "A lot better thanks, but um, would you be mad if I use my diaper instead of the bathroom?"
         Jean laughed a bit, "Not at all sweetie, I'd prefer you to know when you go, so while I'm keeping you in diapers for the week you can use them as if they were the toilet." Jean smiled.
         "Okay mommy!" Kitty chirped, then immediately covered her mouth as she realized what she said. "I'm sorry!"
         "It's okay," Jean said immediately, "I know what you meant to say. Did you want to go now?" Jean asked, trying to change the subject from the mommy deal.
         "No, I usually go before I sleep though." Kitty said, still blushing slightly. "Hey Jean, can I talk to you about how diapers feel? Or is that too weird for you?"
         Jean shrugged her shoulders, "I don't really have much experience with them, changing you so is my only one so far. That said, you can still talk to me about whatever you want and I'll do my best to keep it engaging."
         Kitty smiled and hugged her, "I love you Jean." she said affectionately, hoping Jean understood what she meant. "Not in a like like way, I mean you're pretty and..."
         Jean laughed, "It's okay Kitty, I love you too. Now are you still okay with me changing you?" Kitty nodded and blushed, "No need to be embarrassed honey, I like it. Now what would you like to do babe?"

The world was in danger, Doom was talking about rewriting all creation and three banks had been robbed in the past half hour. It was just a typical tuesday for Janet Van Dyne aka 'The Wasp'.

The fight was long and complicated, especially when the X-men crashed the party with their own world ending combat and the Fantastic Four tried to help but just ended up summoning a monster from the negative zone.
It was at times like this that Janet remembered why she left to become a fashion designer. Not that the Avengers ever let her forget this.
"Hulk rip pants! Where funny bug lady?"

"Janet do something about your damn husband. Oh and the sole of my boot has come off again can you do something about it when we get back. Properly this time?!"
It didn't matter that she was brusied, and beaten, had just taken down five henchmen with her wasp sting that's all they cared about. She was about to scream when she ran smack first into the monsters fist and managed to sale clean out of new york.

She awoke some time later in a bed that wasn't her own in a room that wasn't her own naked. She pulled the sheet around her and stood up. Woozy on her feet she staggered to the window where she looked out on another room. Much bigger than this one and far more normal looking for this one was overly bright and pink and now she realised it rather plastic looking.
"What the?"
"Oh you're up?" came the voice and then the front of the house tore away to reveal a towering girl looking down.
It took Janet a few minutes to realise that this was probably because she was still really small and that she hadn't in fact landed in some parallel dimension where everyone was really big.
"Who are you?" she barked.
"Wait I don't want to hurt you. I found you. You were hurt. I uh took you in."
Janet powered down her wasp sting realising that this was probably the truth and offered a weary "sorry. Uh thanks."
"Don't mention it your Janet Van Dyne the wasp your like the greatest hero ever!"
"If only the rest of the Avengers thought so. Ow!"
"Are you okay?"
"Yeah just pretty beat up and uh pretty cold."
"Oh yeah I uh had to cut off your costume to get to you so I could tend your cuts."
Janet looked down to see that she had a few bandages wrapped around.
"Thank you."
"No problem in fact it's probably time to change them."

Janet couldn't remember the last time anyone had taken care of her beaten or not. "Uh okay."
The giant hands came in and swept her up gently holding her as they lifted her up and to a large waiting bowl of water. Janet was about to cry out when they gently lowered her in and she found that this was not some freezing cold ice bath or fresh from the kettle but a carefully calculated bowl of water just warm enough to relax and her cry of shock turned into a blissful sigh.
"Is that okay?" asked the girl.
"Wonderful" said Janet leaning back. She was so relaxed that she barely noticed when the girl began to carefully remove her bandages and couldn't bring herself to cover herself or claim modesty. In Avengers tower she typically went last and it was usually only a quick shower before duty called. Then came the fingers, with a blob of soap on the end she welcomed them as they worked their way around her in every nook and cranny washing away the dirt and the pain.
Once her bath was done she was lifted out and patted dry by caring hands. They placed her in a stool and then a plate was placed in front of her containing a rich home cooked meal. She was about to ask for a knife and fork when the spoon came at her.
"I don't need to be..."
"Sshh sshh" came the voice who used the opportunity to get the first mouthful in. Janet didn't realise how hungry she was and was soon sat back eating away without a care in the world. Once done the girl wiped her down, as she had spilled a fair bit in her injured yet relaxed state.
"Now we need to get you some clothes before you catch your death."
Touched by the thought and in agreement Janet nodded.

Now it was Janet's turn to blush.

Janet thought about this quickly, Every time she changed size it put new and different pressure on her body as it adapted to essentially a different gravity and centre of balance. Truth be told the last thing she should be doing is sizing up every few hours to use the toilet only to come back down to her current size and she figured it would be out of the question staying big. I mean now the girl could truely care for her, full size that was probably out of the question.
Janet told herself she was only interested in getting better as fast as possible and not in being looking after by a girl. She wasn't sure she believed it.

Natasha Romanoff was one of the most serious and deadly women on the planet. She never let anyone know of course but between missions when nobody was around she bought cute lollita dresses and watched you tube videos on how to get the cutest pinkest makeup looks imaginable. She roleplayed with people online and would often wear diapers to bed.

12112111121211222111122212.content:
"You're here to be her nanny!"
"You can't be serious..." Lois was cut off by a sudden headache. She put her hand to her temple as she felt reality shift around her. No longer was she wearing the smart business attire she had worn to the Daily Planet this morning. Now she was wearing a blue and grey patterned top more suited for a young mother than a reporter. http://www.prlog.org/10124974-bossy-baby... Instead of the business skirt she now had on a pair of pastel blue sweatpants with a drawstring waist. Her hair was also pulled back in a loose ponytail, held by a scrunchie. The man smiled at the changes.
"Now, I know you'll take good care of my princess. In fact, I've made it so you don't have a choice. Even though you still have all your memories, I've made it so you can only act as a caring nanny would for the baby in her care. I've also added the equipment you'll need, as well as made a few fun changes you'll notice when you need. Now, I have a little more work to do, but I'll be back soon. Have fun girls!" With that, the man vanished.

Lois and Wonder Woman looked around. Where before the room only contained the playpen and the toys Diana had made, now it was much more equipped for a baby. There was a changing table, a crib with bars, a large rocking chair, a closet full of baby clothes, and an attached dining room and kitchen. The dining area had a table with two adult chairs and one high chair, and the kitchen had the standard oven, microwave, sink, and refrigerator. Of course, all the baby furniture was properly sized for a full grown woman. Diana groaned. It didn't look like she'd be getting out of this anytime soon. But maybe Lois could help her!

"Lois, you've got to get me out of here. He took my strength, so I can't walk or even control when I go to the bathroom. But if you can get me out of here, maybe the Justice League could help!" Lois shook her head sideways.
"Sorry Diana. I already tried helping you up to get out of here, but my body doesn't respond. Whatever that creep did, I don't have full control of myself either."
Diana sighed dejectedly. If Lois couldn't help her, she didn't know what she was going to do. She still couldn't even stand up. The emotion of the situation was too much for her, and tears started welling in her eyes. She felt so helpless that she gave in and started crying. Lois was heartbroken. She already cared for Diana, and her new nanny thoughts made her want to do anything to stop her baby girl from crying. She kneeled down and embraced Wonder Woman, rubbing her back and soothingly whispering to her. Diana let herself go and hugged Lois back. Even in this terrible situation, she felt a little better with the warm human contact. She finally sniffled a little and stopped crying.

"Feel better baby?" Lois' eyes widened. "Oh my gosh! I'm so sorry, I didn't mean to call you that, it just slipped out." Diana understood, it wasn't her friend's fault the man had given her these new thoughts.
"What should we do now?" Lois asked. Wonder Woman told her how she was playing along while trying to think of an escape plan. Lois agreed that was the best idea, so she helped Diana play with the lasso. Without thinking about it, Lois found herself talking to Diana like a like she was a baby. She found she could only stop it with her full concentration, anything less and she fell back into saying things like "What a big girl!" and "Look what Diana can do all by herself!" Meanwhile, Wonder Woman didn't realize it, but the constant stream of dismissive baby talk was breaking through her defenses, without realizing it she found herself becoming proud of the smallest of accomplishments and grateful for the praise of someone so clearly adult. After a while, Diana had enough of practice. She also realized her stomach was growling.

"What's wrong?" Lois asked.
"I'm actually getting hungry." Wonder Woman said.
"Don't worry, I'll make you some lunch." Lois jumped up and walked toward the fridge. She stopped after a few steps. Wonder Woman was nervous. What was going on? Lois started swaying a bit, and Diana noticed a bead of sweat running down her forehead.
"Diana. I can tell what my body is about to do, and I don't think I can fight it anymore. Just know I'm sorry, I don't want to do this anymore than you want it." Diana nodded. What was happening?

What is happening?

The next morning she woke up in the baby blue room she’d thought was a dream, with Bruce Wayne coming in carrying a silver tray covered with very familiar items in his hands. He’d even brought a new pull-up with him, much to her embarrassment.

“I don’t need that”, she said abruptly while blushing.

He lifted a single eyebrow and let a small, sardonic smile show — “The pull-ups? Your accidents are limited to night time or to your nightmares?” — but never stopped moving until he reached her bedside table to deposit his burden.

Though she was loath to share the story; with anyone; he was a senior leaguer and had helped her out without a word of complaint up until then, so she told what all she’d been able to gather of her situation with the help of her shrink and he sat patiently on the edge of the bed, listening. She’d become so engrossed on the myriad emotions (fear, sadness, embarrassment and powerlessness) that she failed to notice when he started to slowly pull off the bedcovers from her legs until they were bare and was startle away from her memories only when felt his big, warm and rough hand go between her legs and place two fingers inside the edge of the leg band of her pull-up, clearly looking for any dampness there.

“You haven’t had a day without the nightmares, huh? And you’re having trouble with the whole protection thing too.” He said as soon as the fingers retreated, though his hand rested over her crotch, lightly cradling the afore mentioned protection.

“The heck you’re talking about?! I’m wearing them, ain’t I? It’s embarrassing but I get that I need it.” Her tone a little defensive and her emotions once again agitated.

In response to that, quick as lightening, he moved the resting hand to press between her legs again; though this time he purposely did so over a particularly painful area.

“That’s only half the job Helena. You say you have trouble waking up mid sleep, which means you spend most of the night with wet cotton against your skin but you don’t do your best to let it breath during the day, I bet you’ve never used cream and powder once if it wasn’t bedtime. From what I saw yesterday you don’t have anything serious going on but a lot of spots are red, irritated and sensible. That’s probably going to come back and bite you in the ass during a fight, likely while I need your help in the field knowing my luck.”

Red had been coloring her face since she came into the room, but the emotions that fueled it were circling and it now had roots in her indignant embarrassment, she could say nothing to that because she knew it was true... for the most part, that is; no one could be sure it would be Batman she’d be backing when her bullheadedness screwed her over. Her tongue seemed to double in size inside her mouth, so she could barely respond to his next words besides mortified and angry glares.

“I’m going to be checking in on you before bed and before you get up, at least while you’re in Gotham. If you don’t want that tell me now; I’ll get someone else to help me round up the rest of the cockroaches and you’ll go medical leave until you have yourself sorted out.”

1441.content:
Selina Kyle was very busy. At that time, she was making her away across the Gotham City rooftops. She had been tipped off about an alarm that had been tripped downtown at a valuable furniture store, and Batman had been able to determine that the stolen goods had been moved to a certain abandoned apartment building near one of the city's few remaining slums.
Selina took even more care than usual as she made her way around the city. She was as light and agile as she had always been, but her instincts urged her to be cautious for whatever reason.
Catwoman soon made her way to the building with the address Batman had given her. After making certain that the streets were clear, she stepped inside. She quickly discovered that the first floor of the building was empty. So she made her way to the second floor. It was empty as well. However, on the third floor, she entered one certain room, and after she turned on the lights, she discovered it was
1441.title: Harley Quinn and Catwoman

14412.content:
To Catwoman's supplies, she stumbled across a nursery. However, it was bigger than any nursery she had ever seen before. There were toys, games, a changing table, and much other supplies that looked as if they were intended for a person as large as Selina herself.
There was also a large crib at the end of the room. Selina could hear ______ coming from it.
14412.title: a large adult baby nursery.

144122.content:
Catwoman decided to investigate the soft whines. She cautiously approached the crib, keeping her guard up all the way. She had no idea what she would find in it, but she knew she had to determine what it was all the same.
Ever so slowly, she reached the crib and looked in. There was a small-looking figure covered by a large blanket. The cries were emanating from under it.
Catwoman reached down and pulled the blanket away, revealing
144122.title: soft whines

1441221.content: Harley Quinn was underneath the blanket, dressed
1441221.title: Harley Quinn

14412212.content:
Harley was dressed like a baby girl. Much of her body was naked, but she had a pair of red and purple tights covering a great portion of her legs. She had matching booties on both feet. Her arms were bare, save for some soft and purple armbands she wore on either arm. She was wearing soft red and purple gloves as well. Around her neck, she was wearing a soft, hanging red and purple collar.

Her face was covered with her usual white makeup, with her eyes heavily outlined in black and red splotches around her cheeks. She wore black lipstick along her parted lips as she smiled evilly up at Catwoman.

Her long blonde hair was tied in two ponytails, allowing her hair to dangle in opposite directions near her arms.

Her chest was bare except for a red and purple bra that did a fine job of covering her large, finely developed breasts. A little lower, she wore a very small red skirt. This skirt did nothing to hide the most notable thing she was wearing. Harley was wearing a thick, bulky, white disposable diaper with red and purple tapes. It caressed every part of her crotch and bottom, and she seemed to find a great deal of comfort in it.

In her left hand she held a large baby bottle, she held close to her face. In her other hand she held a Teddy Bear that had a wicked grin painted onto its lifeless face.

(If you want an idea of what Harley looks like, take a look at this:

http://2beeadorable.deviantart.com/art/H...

She's freaking gorgeous, right?)

Catwoman was too stunned to speak. Harley Quinn took advantage of this moment and
14412212.title: like a baby girl

choices: He lets her out of the crib
He keeps her in the crib
144122122.content:
Harley Quinn just leaned up slightly, and - continuing to smirk wickedly - pointed her enlarged baby bottle directly at Catwoman. She squeezed it, and an odorless power came out of the top, spreading out onto Catwoman's face
Catwoman abruptly reacted to this. She coughed violently and tried to rub the power away. But after just fifteen seconds, she couldn't feel either her arms or her legs. A few more seconds later, she collapsed onto her back, unable to move a single limb. She was still conscious, but she had no control over voluntary movement.
Harley just smirked, sat up straight, and looked down at the disabled masked woman.
She heard cackling coming from a darkened corner of the room. She looked over to that part of it and Joker stepped out of the shadows, softly clapping his hands together.
"Wonderful work, Harley, my sweet little girl," he told her affectionately.
"Did I do good, Daddy J?" she asked him playfully.
"You certainly did," he replied, tickling her cheek for a moment.
The two of them looked down at Catwoman. She was neatly spread out, temporarily unable to move even the slightest muscle.
"Should we take care of her now?" Harley inquired.
"Oh, we'll 'take care' of her, alright. Batman will be extremely grateful for this," Joker told his sexy accomplice.
"Can you let me out of here first, Mr. J?" Harley asked politely like a good little girl.

What does the Joker do?
144122122.title: disabled Catwoman

choices: They either tie her up or dress her like a baby
They both tie her up and dress her like a baby
1441221221.content:
The Joker just shrugged and said "Why not?"
He unlocked a latch at the end of the crib and brought the railing down vertically. He reached his arms to pick Harley up. Harley first put down the baby bottle and the Teddy Bear. Then she positioned herself so that her knees were above his right arm and her head was above his left arm. The Joker easily picked her up and lifted her out of the crib. He walked with her a few feet away from the crib, holding her close in his arms. She wrapped her arms around his neck and rested her head on his chest. She dreamily looked up into his eyes and said "You are so strong, Mr. J."

"You're as light as a feather, my dead," he insisted. She smiled and rubbed his face delicately.

Joker set Harley down on her feet. As soon as she stood up straight, she gave him a great hug. He hugged her back and patted the back of her diapered bottom a few times.

Catwoman was really stunned by the sight in front of her. The Joker was dressed in his usual semi-formal getup: violet pants, white shirt, green tie, navy blue vest, brown loafers, indigo trench-coat, and teal fedora. Harley was clad only in some tights, booties, gloves, armbands, a neck-piece, a bra, a very short skirt, and a diaper. All save for the last one were red and purple; the diaper was solid white (except for the tapes).

When they came apart, they turned to the physically-disabled Catwoman. The Joker folded his arms and Harley placed her hands on her hips. They stood over her and contemplated on what to do next.

"What do you think we should do with her, Mr. J?" queried Harley. "It won't be long until that stuff I sprayed her with wears off."

"Normally, I'd suggest we just tie her up," the Joker stated, "But given the present circumstances, we can do much more than that."

"How about we dress her up like me?" suggested Harley. "I'd just LOVE to see how the world-famous Catwoman looks dressed like a baby."

"Now, THERE'S a thought," remarked the Joker, "Let's decide quickly, before she regains control of her muscles."

What do the Joker and Harley do to Catwoman?
1441221221.title: He lets her out of the crib

14412212211.content: What do they do to her?
14412212211.title: They either tie her up or dress her like a baby

14412212212.content:
After a few moments of silent pondering, Harley snapped her fingers and said "I know, Mr. J! How about we do both? Let's tie her up AND dress her like a baby!"

The Joker just smiled and placed his hand on his young accomplice's shoulder. He said "Brilliant thinking, Harley. Let's do it."

"A-Okay, Mr. J!" Harley retorted.

"You get her undressed and get her in the appropriate attire," Joker ordered, giving Harley's diaper a few soft yet firm pats, "I'll get something to restrain her with."

Harley nodded and watched her lover exit the room, leaving her alone with the defenseless Catwoman. She gazed down at her with a look of tremendous satisfaction in her eyes.

"Better get started," she told herself.

She knelt down next to Catwoman and removed both of her boots. Then she moved up closer to her upper-body. She found the zipper at the top of her catsuit and slowly pulled it down. When the zipper reached Catwoman's waist, Harley raised her up slightly and pulled both of her arms out of their sleeves. Then she pulled the rest of the catsuit off of Catwoman's legs. Now Catwoman was naked, save for her mask, her bra, her panties, her gloves, and her tights.

Harley took a moment to study Catwoman's body. Behind all that spandex, she had a rather sultry figure. Harley seemed to relish in the fact that Catwoman was now under her and the Joker's control for the time being.

Harley proceeded to remove Catwoman's tights and gloves. Once this was accomplished, she ever so slowly pulled over her sexy black satin panties, revealing her clean shaven crotch.

"Good healthy, clean girl," commented Harley mockingly. Now Catwoman was clad in only her bra and mask.

"I'll let the mask and bra stay on for now," Harley announced, "But they may come off later."

Harley slowly stood up and walked - more like waddled, given the thick bulk of the diaper between her legs - over to a large changing table and took some powder, some lotion, and a large thick disposable diaper. She walked back over to Catwoman and positioned her onto a changing mat. Catwoman fiercely tried to put up a struggle, but she could not move an inch.

"Don't resist," Harley warned, "You might actually like dressing up like a baby just as I do."

Harley unfolded the diaper, lifted Catwoman up by her ankles, and placed the diaper under her bottom. She carefully lowered her down onto the diaper. Then she applied a thin layer of lotion and baby powder onto her crotch. Once this was accomplished, Harley took a hold of the front of the diaper and brought it up snugly between Catwoman's legs. Holding it in place with one hand, she used her other hand to fasten the tapes up on both sides. Then she patted the front of Catwoman's diaper, making certain that it was on correctly. She leaned back and smiled down, proud of her work.

A moment later, Joker came back with some ropes. Harley looked up at him and smiled.

"Excellent work, Harley," he complimented his lover, "Now let's get her wrapped up."

"Just a moment," Harley insisted, "There's something I want to do first."

Harley took Catwoman, turned her onto her stomach, and moved her onto her lap. Catwoman was lying in a position where her diaper was directly above the young female clown's diaper.

What did Harley do to Catwoman next?
14412212212.title: They both tie her up and dress her like a baby

144122122121.content:
Harley slowly raised her hand into the air until it was about four feet above Catwoman's diapered bottom. She said quietly "This hurts me more than you."

Than she spanked Catwoman right through her diaper. She was not too rough, but she did spank her enough to incite a reaction. Catwoman would have moaned, had she not been rendered immobile.

Harley spanked Catwoman over and over again, letting each blow deliver the same amount of force. After spanking her a total of twenty times, she let up and said "That felt great. I guess there's no need to punish here anymore for the moment. Right, Mr. J?"

"Right indeed, sweetheart," the Joker replied, "Now let's get her wrapped up."

Harley placed her hands on Catwoman's shoulders and made her sit straight up. She then took both of the masked woman's hands and put them behind her back. Joker proceeded to bind her hands together with some of the rope. After looping it around her wrists a total of fifteen times, he tied a secure knot and tested the rope's strength to ensure that Catwoman could not break her hands free when she regained control of them.

After binding her hands, Joker used another rope to bind Catwoman's feet together in the same fashion. Then he used another rope to bind the upper parts of her legs together. Once he was finished with this, he smirked and commented "A nice job, if I do say so myself."

Harley smiled and said "It's almost perfect, Puddin'. You just forgot one thing."

"Really?" said the Joker in surprise. "What might that be?"

"The gag," Holly answered him straightforwardly.

Joker lightly slapped himself on the forehead and said "Ah, yes. How foolish of me! How could I forget to gag her? It's not like a pacifier would keep her quiet!"

At that, Joker reached into the pocket of his trench-coat and removed a large white cloth. He was about to gag Catwoman when Harley asked him ever so kindly "Can I do it? Please?"

Joker just smiled, said "Since you asked so nicely, of course you can," and gave her the cloth.

Harley took the cloth and got behind Catwoman. She brought the center of the cloth over the bound woman's mouth and tied the ends together tightly at the back of her head. As a result, Catwoman was tightly gagged. Even if she had control over her vocal cords, at that moment she wouldn't be able to speak a single word.

"Now just look at that, Mr. J," Harley marveled, "We've got Batman's lover trussed up and diapered in front of us. It's a good thing we decided to go through with that plan."

"Indeed, Harley," remarked Joker, "You would have thought that someone as perceptive as Catwoman would have smelt a rat before getting into trouble."

Catwoman just sighed. She should have known this whole thing was just a trap set for her!

"What now, Puddin'?" inquired Harley, "Should we stay here a little longer, or should we take our guest to our main hideout?"

Joker sat thinking for a while. Both options had their pros and cons. In the end, he decided that they would
144122122121.title: She spanked her

1441221221211.content:
He decided that they would go to their main hideout.
"We should bring our special guest along with us," he told Harley.
His sexy Adult Baby sidekick grinned and said "You got it, Mr. J!"
She then waddled over to a closet, opened it up, and pulled out a very large stroller. She pushed it towards the center of the room and stopped in front of the helpless Catwoman.
She walked around the stroller, knelt down, and took Catwoman by her arms, forcing her to sit up. She looked up at the Joker and asked sweetly "Can I have a little assistance here, Puddin'?"
The Joker just smirked and remarked "With pleasure."
He placed his hands on Catwoman's bare thighs and lifted her up into the stroller. Then he and Harley positioned her so that she was sitting perfectly in it.
Once this was accomplished, they strapped her in using the buckles on the sides of the stroller. They used four different straps: one on her lower legs, one on her upper legs, one on her torso, and one on her shoulders. They tightened each strap up well to ensure that Catwoman could not escape.
As Harley double-checked the stroller's restraints, the Joker took a backpack out of a cabinet. He gathered up Catwoman's uniform, as well as a few extra diapers, and stuffed them all inside the pack. Then he put the backpack on and told Harley cockily "Time to take the baby on a ride."
"I'm with you on that, Mr. J. Just one moment," Harley responded. She walked back over to the closet and pulled out two guns: an AK-47 and a Walther P99. She tossed the Walther P99 to her Boss and kept the AK-47 to herself. After making certain that their weapons were properly loaded, Joker smirked and said "Let's move."
Harley just smiled and left the room with her AK-47 at the ready. Joker followed her, pushing Catwoman along in her stroller.
Once he was out in the hallway, he pulled a key out of his trenchcoat and locked the door to the nursery. Then he and Holly walked on without interruption.
Catwoman sighed in angry defeat. However, little did she know that on her way to the hideout...
1441221221211.title: go to their main hideout

14412212212111.content:
Even though Catwoman preferred to work alone, every now and then, Batman, Robin, Batgirl, and some of their allies would assist her with her work.
Barbara Gordon had noticed Selina Kyle was in a hurry to leave from their meeting at the mall, and decided to investigate. She got into her Batgirl costume and followed Selina all the way to the building. But she had not gone inside. Instead. She had perched herself on top of a building across the street and wait until her accomplice came back out.
She waited to inform Batman about her findings until she had something of significance to report to him.
After about twenty minutes of waiting, she could hear something - or someone - approaching the front door. Even from that distance, she had very perceptive hearing. She hid herself in the shadows and waited. What came out caught her completely by surprise.
Three people came outside. Two of them were Harley Queen and the Joker. However, Harley Quinn was scantily clad. She appeared to be wearing some tights, gloves, a few accessories, and a red and purple bikini top with a white bikini bottom. At least, that was what Batgirl thought it was originally. She looked a little closer and realized that what Harley was wearing was much too bulky to be panties. She soon realized that the female criminal was wearing a diaper!
But that was not what shocked her the most. What REALLY shocked her was that Joker was pushing a large stroller along. In it was Catwoman, tied up, gagged, and naked except for a diaper, as well.
Batgirl was both confused and concerned. She wanted to jump in and help her friend, but it would be too risky to do so under the circumstances: both Harley and the Joker were armed. Batgirl had an assortment of gadgets in her belts, but they were no match for automatic and semi-automatic weapons at close range.
She kept her distance, but followed the small group from the rooftops. She was determined to free her friend from the criminally deranged duo.
14412212212111.title: she had been followed by Batgirl

144122122122.content:
'Poor ickle Kitten, completely helpless...' said Harley, grinning at Catwoman.
Her fingers tiptoed down Catwoman's body, down to her sides.
'Well, wouldn't it be naughty if I took advantage of that. Maybe... with a ickle wickle...TICKLE!'
Suddenly Harley's fingers were smoothly running all over as fast as a blur. She digged into Catwoman's thighs, and sides, and all of her other most ticklish spots. How had she known that these were her worst places?
Catwoman wanted to scream, or even just squirm. But she couldn't move an inch thanks to the paralysis. Harley started tickle her feet delicately but quickly, teasing her as she danced her fingers against her sole.
'Cootchie cootchie coo, cootchie cootchie coooooo!' She chanted, as she went back to Catwoman's tummy, going up and down, pattering across her stomach. 'I think baby likes it, doesn't she!' Catwoman couldn't respond. She thought she was going to go mad with the tantilising torture.
'Yes she does, yes she dooooeeeees!' Harley sang, now digging in to Catwoman's sides. 'THIS little kitten is quite the cutie...'.
Finally, the Joker, laughing, gently took Harley's.
'Alright honeybun, I think we've tickled the little cutie quite enough... for now'
Harley reluctantly stopped, and sat Catwoman on her lap.
'Alright puddin, I guess I just couldn't resist. She IS adorable, isn't she?'
Catwoman still couldn't move, but now blushed furiously. Harley saw, and smirked.
'Well now, I think it's time we put the rest of our plan into action, isn't it honey?' Joker said, pinching Harley's cheek.
'Time to...'
144122122122.title: She tickled her
